sn35.28:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā gayāyaṁ vihārati gayāsīse saddhiṁ bhikkhusahassena. Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn35.28:2: Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinanduṁ. Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
